module.title: NRPE Client
module.description: NRPE client can be used both from command line and from queries to check remote systes via NRPE as well as configure the NRPE server
module.name: NRPEClient

exec_nrpe.description: Execute remote script via NRPE. (Most likely you want nrpe_query).

submit_nrpe.description: Submit information to remote host via NRPE. (Most likely you want nrpe_query).

nrpe_forward.description: Forward the request as-is to remote host via NRPE.
